chart.title: Biofuel energy production
chart.subtitle: Total biofuel production is measured in terawatt-hours (TWh) per year. Biofuel production includes both bioethanol and biodiesel.
chart.citation: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024)

Biofuels production - TWh.descriptionShort: Includes biogasoline (such as ethanol) and biodiesel. Volumes have been adjusted for energy content.
Biofuels production - TWh.citationShort: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024) – with major processing by Our World in Data
Biofuels production - TWh.citationLong: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024) – with major processing by Our World in Data. “Biofuels production” [dataset]. Energy Institute, “Statistical Review of World Energy” [original data].
